entry.summary: So I recently moved from a self-hosted unifi controller to a unifi cloud key gen2. https://eu.store.ui.com/collections/unifi-accessories-cloud-key/products/unifi-cloud-key-gen2 I wanted to be able to access it locally though over https with a valid cert. It turns out the cloudkey just runs a basic debian strech install with standard apt commands! So heres how I made that happpen. Pre-requisit...
